> 1) validators created with the deposit-cli before the genesis of the CL
There isn't much/any difference between pre-genesis and post-genesis. 0x01 credentials became available in April 2021 I think, so quite a few months after. There are, by your definition, no 0x01 "legacy" validators (yet).

> 2) is that option available already?
No.

> 3) does 0x01 lock a validator to a particular EL address?
Yes. If you want to change the address, you will have to do a full withdrawal + redeposit.
